mrpac.Utils.biggest_volume_fm

mrpac.Utils.biggest_volume_fm(arr)

Keep the biggest consecutive slices with contours.

Parameters:

arr (np.ndarray) – A 3D binary mask prediction of the femoral heads.

Returns:

The 3D binary mask after processing as well as its superior most slice number.

Return type:

Tuple[np.ndarray, int]
